results.title: Second reality
results.creator_credit: Stacey Fischer, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Always on the move, changing schools, losing new friends, Stacey Fischer escaped from the real world of loneliness to a world where she could create people who couldn’t leave - a place where she would be safe.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Stacey Fischer, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: A Sad realisation
results.creator_credit: Vivian Tran, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: The sight of ugly bare land and the sound of heavy machinery where once stood a forest of trees are all too real for Vivian Tran to block out. Trees cannot protect themselves against being logged. A poignant story.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Vivian Tran, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: My first year
results.creator_credit: Louise Bryant, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Louise shares her experiences and the three most important lessons she learnt in her first year as a secondary teacher. These are the things they don’t teach you at uni; survival, rewards and pleasant surprises.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Louise Bryant, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: iFavourite
results.creator_credit: Peter Ngo, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: A glimpse into Peter Ngo’s world of techno music, video games, video editing and fun in the sun at the Alpine School. To Ngo’s mind, doing what you enjoy is the path to happiness and finding yourself.

results.title: Gia mas (About us)
results.creator_credit: Parthena Savvidou, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: After her mother left, Parthena Savvidou and her father fled to Greece to live with Parthena’s grandparents for six years before their eventual return to Australia. This story is about Parthena’s memories of life in Greece and her special relationship with her father. A thank you from a daughter to her father.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Parthena Savvidou, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: After her mother left, Parthena Savvidou and her father fled to Greece to live with Parthena’s grandparents for six years before their eventual return to Australia. This story is about Parthena’s memories of life in Greece and her special relationship with her father. A thank you from a daughter to her father.

results.title: Crossenvale stories : Digital Storytelling project
results.brief_description: Eight residents of the Crossendale estate in Echuca in Northern Victoria share their personal stories as part of a Digital Storytelling workshop. While the subjects vary, the topic is mostly centred around the things that lie closest to the participants’ hearts.
results.description: Eight residents of the Crossendale estate in Echuca in Northern Victoria share their personal stories as part of a Digital Storytelling workshop. While the subjects vary, the topic is mostly centred around the things that lie closest to the participants’ hearts.
